sentences: See laps on kuri ja pidevalt segadust teeb.
context: The Estonian word 'kuri' is an adjective that describes something or someone as evil, bad, wicked, or mean. It can be used to describe malicious behavior, unpleasant characters, or morally wrong actions. For example, it could refer to an evil person (kuri inimene), a bad/mean child (kuri laps), or an evil spirit/kurivaim.
